name: Ruins (Feishiko)
description:
The young man steped into the ruins, to find something what he need,it's his adventure.

This game formed by a lots of randomly, fantastic events, so I think it maybe something roguelite meanings.

In this game, by types 1 to 5 number to choose these options, and then step into the next room,all the number of room is 50,and I think it also have some luck element in here to avoid you defeat this game.

So, good luck this way.
